Detailed Description

An abstruct class for drawing syntax.

An implemenation of QSyntaxHighlighter which can handle highlight defintions from the kate project.

This will make a normal QTextEdit show text just as kate does.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

QECodeHighlighter::QECodeHighlighter (   ) 
 

Default constructor. All it does is setting the highlightData to NULL and call QSyntaxHighlighter's constructor.
